divs: Sighting DetailsWatching Television and heard helicopter. Went outside to investigate. Looked NNW and saw flickering light in sky. Thought it was a childs silver balloon at first. Object moved slowly either north or down and then to the east. When object shifted from shiny to dark it appeared to be a cube shape. Observed for eleven minutes. My attention was taken away by a high flying airliner that was flying NNW and when I again looked the object had disappeared. This object appeared to be far away and I observed it through binoculars. I knew I was looking at something unusual, or had the feeling I was anyway.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around July 9th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: erratic flashing object turned bright white to brownish color alternating
